main event: A sighting of a round white object that turned red when moving at Camp Pon-Tok, Maryland, on 23 June 1955.
interesting points: The object was initially mistaken for a star before increasing in size and changing color., The object remained stationary for the duration of the observation., The sighting lasted for about 1 minute., There were multiple witnesses present., The object was described as being the size of a quarter.
sighted object: round white object that turned red when moving
